title: Vampire bat
data:

*For a list of all vampires, see [list of vampires](/List_of_vampires "List of vampires").*

| vampire bat b [![Vampire bat.png](/images/4/46/Vampire_bat.png)](/File:Vampire_bat.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                          | 6-14                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |

| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                 | [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment")                                                                                |

| Flags                                                                                   | [Evil](/Evil "Evil") [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") [Flying](/Flying "Flying") [Unbreathing](/Unbreathing "Unbreathing") [Batty](/Batty "Batty") [Warm-blooded](/Blood_temperature "Blood temperature") [No poly](/No_poly "No poly") |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A large black bat with vicious fangs that feeds on blood. This is the preferred form for vampires in disguise.***“For something is amiss and out of place When mice with wings can wear a human face.” -Theodore Roethke, “The Bat”. 1938. |

## Useful Info

**Vampire bats** resemble standard [bats](/Bat "Bat"), but are actually weak [vampires](/Vampire_\(monster\) "Vampire (monster)") in disguise; their bites restore their [HP](/HP "HP"), and they are slightly more durable than bats. They often come with a pack of bat allies as well, but these are no more dangerous than they were when you were a level 1 character. You can find vampire bats in the middle-[Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon") or in certain vaults of [the Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair").

## Tips & Tricks

- In spite of the name and flavour text, they cannot transform into actual vampires.
- They have the usual assortment of undead strengths and weaknesses, but they're generally so weak that this doesn't matter.
html:
Vampire bat

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all vampires, see list of vampires.

vampire bat b 
HP 6-14
HD 3
XP 56
Speed 30
AC 1
EV 14
Will 10
Attack1 3 (bite: vampiric)


Resistances rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Undead
Size Tiny
Type bat, vampire bat
Flags Evil
See invisible
Flying
Unbreathing
Batty
Warm-blooded
No poly
A large black bat with vicious fangs that feeds on blood. This is the preferred form for vampires in disguise.

“For something is amiss and out of place
When mice with wings can wear a human face.”
-Theodore Roethke, “The Bat”. 1938.


Useful Info

Vampire bats resemble standard bats, but are actually weak vampires in disguise; their bites restore their HP, and they are slightly more durable than bats. They often come with a pack of bat allies as well, but these are no more dangerous than they were when you were a level 1 character. You can find vampire bats in the middle-Dungeon or in certain vaults of the Lair.

Tips & Tricks

  • In spite of the name and flavour text, they cannot transform into actual vampires.
  • They have the usual assortment of undead strengths and weaknesses, but they're generally so weak that this doesn't matter.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Vampire_bat&oldid=60437"

{{version028}}
''For a list of all vampires, see [[list of vampires]].''
{{monster info}}


==Useful Info==
'''Vampire bats''' resemble standard [[bat]]s, but are actually weak [[vampire (monster)|vampires]] in disguise; their bites restore their [[HP]], and they are slightly more durable than bats. They often come with a pack of bat allies as well, but these are no more dangerous than they were when you were a level 1 character. You can find vampire bats in the middle-[[Dungeon]] or in certain vaults of [[the Lair]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*In spite of the name and flavour text, they cannot transform into actual vampires.
*They have the usual assortment of undead strengths and weaknesses, but they're generally so weak that this doesn't matter.
